name: Brody Web Design
description:
Brody Web Design focuses on the smallest attributes from a logo designed to a fully functional social media cms website.
We are a Phoenix, Arizona Web Design Company, but we cater to the world with our knowledge in most frameworks including; HTML5, Parallax, Jquery / Javascript, CSS 3.0 and programming PHP MVC frameworks such as Laravel, Code ignitor, Smarty and other languages such as Ruby on Rails and Python.
